name: Sal's Dungeon
description:
You are in a Strange Dungeon Trying to Survive The Prisoners and Achieving Whatever That Helps you to be Stronger 

There are three types of items you can hold and for each type there are three items:

1- Axes 2- Swords 3- Shields

Also there are Potions that you can find and use to be better

Control:

WASD : to move

E : to interact or pick up

Tab : to show items panel

LMB : attack

RMB : use shield

L Shift : Sprint
